product_name: bareMineralsORIGINAL Loose Matte Talc-Free Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 â€‹
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHSA/FSA eligibleBareMinerals Loose Matte Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15 is a lightweight, talc-free skin-improving foundation made with only 7 clean Ingredients. It provides buildable sheer-to-full, all-day coverage with a matte finish, while minimizing the look of pores and imperfections.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically shown to reduce shine and absorb excess oil**Based on a 6-week US clinical study of 30 peopleWears all day without clogging pores, causing breakouts or settling into fine linesDermatologist-testedHypoallergenicNon-comedogenicNon-acnegenicFeaturesAll BareMinerals products are free of parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, chemical sunscreens, triclosan, triclocarban, propylene glycol, mineral oil, coal tar and microbeadsThis product is also formulated without talc, gluten or synthetic fragranceKey IngredientsTITANIUM DIOXIDE & ZINC OXIDE: Provide non-chemical, mineral-based sunscreen protection from UVA and UVB raysBISMUTH OXYCHLORIDE & MICA: Provide a luminous finish with a silky, soft-skin feelIRON OXIDES: Mineral-based pigments for natural-looking color and coverageItem 2209455How To UsePrep skin with SKINLONGEVITY Long Life Herb Serum for smoother, easier makeup application.Pair with the Beautiful Finish Brush:SWIRL a small amount of foundation in the cap until it disappears into the brush.TAP away any excess.BUFF onto skin using circular motions to activate the minerals. Repeat until you've achieved desired coverage level.CLICK, LOCK, GO Sifter:First time use: Remove the clear tab to open the sifter. Loose minerals can now be dispensed into the cap for SWIRL, TAP, BUFF application.After use, turn the sifter clockwise until you hear a CLICK, in order to LOCK in the foundation.GO about your day - the loose minerals will stay locked in place.IngredientsDeepest Deep: Active: Titanium Dioxide 15%, Zinc Oxide 5%. Inactive: Lauroyl Lysine. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prep skin with SKINLONGEVITY Long Life Herb Serum for smoother, easier makeup application.Pair with the Beautiful Finish Brush:SWIRL a small amount of foundation in the cap until it disappears into the brush.TAP away any excess.BUFF onto skin using circular motions to activate the minerals. Repeat until you've achieved desired coverage level.CLICK, LOCK, GO Sifter:First time use: Remove the clear tab to open the sifter. Loose minerals can now be dispensed into the cap for SWIRL, TAP, BUFF application.After use, turn the sifter clockwise until you hear a CLICK, in order to LOCK in the foundation.GO about your day - the loose minerals will stay locked in place.
ingredients: Zinc Oxide 5%. Inactive: Lauroyl Lysine. May Contain: Mica

reviews.headline: Bare Minerals Foundation is Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Iv been wearing Bare Minerals loose powered foundation since it was introduced many years ago, it is very quick and easy to apply and stays on without having to reapply or touch up. It's the absolute best foundation, love it!!

reviews.headline: I have bought this item several times.
reviews.comments: Very happy with product. It matches my skin tone perfectly.

reviews.headline: I would definetly buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love this

reviews.headline: Loyal to bareMinerals
reviews.comments: Nothing compares to this brand of mineral powder with its minimal ingredients instead of a paragraph of ingredients like others contain. Less is better -& beneficial for your skin .

reviews.headline: Wow, bare minerals too?
reviews.comments: I stopped using bare minerals after 20 yrs bc of price gouging. Now that Mac ruined their powder foundation I came back to this??? Theyve changed their formula too. And it sucks. Bad. Coverage is awful.

reviews.headline: I love would buy this product again.  It is very natural
reviews.comments: Very satisfied

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again.
reviews.comments: It did not blend into my skin. It stayed on the surface and it changed the color after applying turned my face kinda orange. I returned it.

reviews.headline: Good *if* you can find a shade that matches you
reviews.comments: This product has beautiful coverage and it is effortless to put on, adding a good amount of coverage. I love using this for work in the early morning as I don't have more than 10 minutes to do my makeup.  It looks beautiful on the skin.  The problem?  It oxidizes like 2-3 shades darker.  I had tried shade #3, and exchanged it for shade #2 which seemed to help but still looks very dark.  Sadly I will be returning more than likely.  I wish they could come out with lighter shades!  If you a very fair skin girly (I'm N4 with MAC) I would steer clear because this will have your face looking 2-3 shades darker than you are.

reviews.headline: Best Foundation
reviews.comments: I've been using Bare Minerals foundation for years. I buy the Matte as I have oily skin and it helps to keep the shine away. It's light weight on your skin and doesn't fall into lines or wrinkles and helps to hide pores. I use primer first apply the foundation and then the Mineral Veil. Looks as good at the end of the day as when I put it on in the morning. I also like the ability to be able to mix colors if I want a little more color on my face in the summer.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years  and will continue to

reviews.headline: Definitely go with the matte if you have combo skin!
reviews.comments: Love love love I got both the original and the matte and the matte lasts all day long on my combo skin! Also get the shade that you think you are the shade match had me as a medium way too dark. I am between the 5-9 and it had me at the 11.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Perfection. Perfect match. Easy to apply.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Perfection. Perfect match. Easy to apply.

reviews.headline: Amazing!!
reviews.comments: Perfection. Perfect match. Easy to apply.

reviews.headline: Loyal Customer 20 years
reviews.comments: Never fails me. Will use this product until it doesn't want me to anymore!

reviews.headline: Formula changed
reviews.comments: Used to love this. Nearly impossible to blend.   seperates and gets pathchy within hours. Only pro is helps control oil better then liquid foundations ive tried

reviews.headline: Formula changed
reviews.comments: Used to love this. Nearly impossible to blend.   seperates and gets pathchy within hours. Only pro is helps control oil better then liquid foundations ive tried

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin. This foundation is the only one I have found that doesn't make my face break out. The color is a good match also.

reviews.headline: Favorite
reviews.comments: I've been using this for years. Would definitely recommend.

media.headline: I would never wear anything else

faceoff_positive.comments: I HAVE BEEN USING ALL THE PRODUCTS FOR WELL OVER 15YEARS. I HAVE BOUGHT, BEFORE I RETIRED, MANY FRIENDS AND FAMILY MEMBERS STARTER KITS (NOT CHEAP) BUT WORTH THEM KNOWING THEY CAN HIDE ALL FLAWS. I AM 68 YEARS OLD AND PEOPLE TELL ME ALL THE TIME THAT I HAVE SUCH YOUNG BEAUTIFUL SKIN. I MUST ADMIT, I HAVE NEVER USED A MOISTURIZER IN MY LIFE BUT NEVER REALLY SEEN A NEED FOR IT. I DISCOVERED BARE MINERALS OVER 15 YEARS AGO AND SWEAR BY IT. SINCE RETIRING, INCOME DROPPED BIG TIME MAKING IT HARD TO PURCHASE SO I AM VERY STINGY WITH IT. I USE IT EVERYDAY. BESIDES BRUSHING MY TEETH, ITS THE FIRST THING I DO WHEN I WAKE UP. PLEASE NEVER DISCONTINUE THE PRODUCTS. I LOVE YOU!!
faceoff_positive.headline: LOOKS LIKE PERFECT SKIN, SO I,M TOLD!

faceoff_negative.comments: Lets just start by saying I have been using BE products for over 4years. Loved the original foundation but in the summer at times made me look to shiny. So I decided to try the matte version. The colors are slightly darker than the orginal. Coverage is much more sheer so I feel I would use a jar of this up much faster needing to use more to get the coverage I like. Felt heavy on my skin and my skin also felt tight. Did like the finish it left but after using this for a month or so it broke my skin out very bad. Pimples and lots of redness like my skin was burned. I will be going back to the original and will never ever put this version near my skin again. So if your skin is sensitve I woul be very careful about this matte version.
faceoff_negative.headline: never again!

rollup.name: ORIGINAL Loose Matte Talc-Free Mineral Powder Foundation SPF 15
